I just joined here a week or so ago, thought I'd post up my first 
message.  Though I do have a couple of purposes for posting.

First one being that there seems to be a glitch in OpenGlad 0.97 
Win32 where if you try to backtrack levels the game crashes.  Though 
it seems to be fine if you just use the Setlevel command from the 
menu to a previously played level.  If anyone wants/needs more info 
on this I'll recreate the error and give more specifics.

Also, I downloaded the Gladiator: BF alpha from here, but I can't 
get it to run under Win XP Pro.  It'll run up to the point that you 
hit "Go," albeit running with a seriously wrong palette.  If anyone 
has gotten it to run under XP before, please mail me.

Thanks for any help.

  - David
